data.message:
HELP HELP HELP !

I need to find out about a person who is making an account for public content to blackmail all the girls in the school and nobody is able to find out about him. His contact or link is 

http://www.facebook.com/pages/FSD-Lucas/166553596692952

and he has many accounts, after each time it is blocked he keeps on making a new one. But it cannot be stopped. The person behind needs to be told by contacting his parents. It is like a social problem for the school and the city. He is publishing bad rumors which is like a pain for everyone. Please send me information from where we can find out about the person who's making this profile..?
